articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Description of how the site was built, for proper attribution
articles.contents:
This site was developed in R Markdown; two packages were heavily used: the distill package, by Allaire et al1; and the postcards package, by Sean Kross.
The “M-F-E-O: postcards + distill” tutorial by Alison Hill was instrumental in guiding the development of the website. My sincere thanks to all of the developers of the above packages, as well as the author of the tutorial, for democratising the process of making websites!

Allaire, et al. (2018, Sept. 10). Distill for R Markdown. Retrieved from https://rstudio.github.io/distill↩

            I am a PhD candidate in antimicrobial resistance, supervised by scientists in the KCL Institute of Pharmaceutical Science and Public Health England.
            In my spare time, I like petting cats,1 brewing,2 and baking!3
            
            My own as well as others!↩
            Only cider and mead thus far, but hope to try beer soon :)↩
            Mostly bread because cakes are hard…↩
